code: import{Cookies}from'react-cookie';var cookies=new Cookies();export var setRefreshToken=function setRefreshToken(refreshToken){var today=new Date();var expireDate=today.setDate(today.getDate()+7);return cookies.set('refresh_token',refreshToken,{sameSite:'strict',path:'/',expires:new Date(expireDate)});};export var getCookieToken=function getCookieToken(){return cookies.get('refresh_token');};export var removeCookieToken=function removeCookieToken(){return cookies.remove('refresh_token',{sameSite:'strict',path:'/'});};
